There have few parameters for check the camera pixals.8MP will produce 2 -3 MB pic size .
12MP will produce 3-4MB
16MP camera's pic size will be 4-5mb
And 20-24 MP camera's pic size will be 6mb minimum...n that image will not blur after zooming up....
